news.title: Google: Guest Blog Post Links Have Zero Value
news.description: Revisiting an issue that has been a topic of discussion among SEOs for a number of years, Google’s John Mueller stated that there is no value associated with guest blog post links.

news.title: Should You Buy & Redirect Expired Domains?
news.description: While purchasing and redirecting the backlinks from expired domains may have been a common SEO tactic in years past, presently it is unlikely to benefit your site’s performance.

news.title: 41% of Google’s First Page Contains Links to Google Products
news.description: A recent study indicates that almost half of the listings that appear on the first page of results from a Google search are comprised of products, links, and information from Google itself.

news.title: Google Makes it Easier to Find Jobs, Recipes, and Products
news.description: Searches for products, jobs, and recipes will now have Google activity cards that are designed especially for those topics, containing rich media and more specific information.
